title: {{Apt 2b/2b Sunnyvale Master room with private bath}}
posting_body: ['The apartment is in a great location .', 'Looking for a roommate to rent a single master room with a private bath for $1430/month, This is a contemporary 2 Bedroom/2 Bath apartment in a quiet, safe residential neighborhood in Sunnyvale.', 'The place is close to El Camino and Wolfe Rd.', 'You will enjoy the convenience of the center of Silicon Valley, just a few minutes drive away, 5 minute to apple, 15 minute to google, easily connect to Costco- 1.5 mile, central express 1.8 miles, hwy 101, 280, 237 ......', '2 beds/2 bathrooms on the bright and airy 2nd floor, living room has a big balcony.', 'You will share the kitchen and living area with another roommate.', 'TV cable, Water and garbage include; you share PG&E and high speed internet.', '(total about $40) washer &dryer in corridor, have permit parking in apt parking lot.', 'Deposit $600 .', 'Lease minimum 6 months or longer.', '(There have simple furniture if you need it )', 'Looking for a professional, clean, responsible, no drugs, no parties, no overnight guests.', 'No drama allowed!', 'You can feel free to email me and let me know who you are and if you would like to come look at the room please leave phone# I will contact you.']
